x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Teachers need a unified tool to monitor student attendance, participation, and engagement in both physical and virtual classrooms.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

An App Engine-based module that tracks attendance via QR codes or virtual check-ins, integrated with performance dashboards for engagement metrics.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Mobile App, App Engine,

Performance Analytics

IntegrationHub, Integration with Biometrics and other platforms

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Ensuring privacy in attendance and behavioral data collection.
